mapper.insert: insert into doc(doc_title, doc_content, doc_date, doc_id, doc_image) values(#{docTitle}, #{docContent}, sysdate, doc_seq.nextval, #{docImage})
insert into chapter(doc_title, chapter_title, chapter_index) values(#{docTitle}, #{chapterTitle}, #{chapterIndex})
insert into detail(doc_title, chapter_content, chapter_index, detail_index) values(#{docTitle}, #{chapterContent}, #{chapterIndex}, #{detailIndex})
mapper.update: update doc set doc_content = #{docContent}, doc_date = sysdate where doc_title = #{docTitle}
update chapter set chapter_title = #{chapterTitle} where doc_title = #{docTitle} and chapter_index = #{chapterIndex}
update detail set chapter_content = #{chapterContent} where doc_title = #{docTitle} and chapter_index = #{chapterIndex} and detail_index = #{detailIndex}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from doc order by dbms_random.value) where rownum = 1
select doc_title from doc where doc_title like #{search}||'%'
